questions.question: The fact that must be deemed while employing Kerberos authentication is________

answers.a: Kerberos can be susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks to gain unauthorized access.
answers.b: Kerberos tickets can be spoofed using replay attacks to network resources.
answers.c: Kerberos requires a centrally managed database of all user and resource passwords.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the authenticator in the Kerberos protocol?

answers.a: To prove the user's identity to the KDC
answers.b: To prove the user's identity to the TGS
answers.c: To request a new session key
answers.d: To prove the user's identity to the resource server

questions.question: Kerberos is a system used to throttle users abusing their access to a distributed file system.
